Package com.dca.checkers.ui

Class CheckersWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.dca.checkers.ui.CheckersWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class CheckersWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The CheckersWindow class is responsible for managing a window. This window contains a game of checkers and also options to change the settings of the game with an OptionPanel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
